caption.title: Fire results by scenario as a percentage of total area.
caption.p: (A) AWF (Area with fire; the area of all grid cells experiencing any fire); (B) FAB (Fraction area burned; the fraction of are burned in grid cells with fire); and (C) TAB (Total area burned; the sum of (AWF * FAB) over all grid cells). (FF-WCE: full fire, with CO 2 fertilization effect; FS-WCE: with fire suppression, with CO 2 fertilization effect; SF-WCE: with stochastic ignitions, with CO 2 fertilization effect; and FF-NCE: full fire, with no fertilization effect. Results smoothed using triangle smoothing +/- 8 years).
